languages.text: Each stack reduces all stats by 5 and increases chance of incoming Crit chance by 5%. Additionaly, this creature has 1% chance of receiving {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}Immobilized{/g} for 1 round at the start of its turn.

traits.locale_text: Each stack reduces all stats by 5 and increases chance of incoming Crit chance by 5%. Additionaly, this creature has 1% chance of receiving {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}Immobilized{/g} for 1 round at the start of its turn.

languages.text: Each stack of this effect reduces all characteristics by −5 and increases the critical hit chance of incoming attacks by +5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, at the start of this character's turn, they have a 1% chance of becoming {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Each stack of this effect reduces all characteristics by −5 and increases critical hit chance of incoming attacks by +5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, at the start of their turn, this character has a 1% chance of becoming {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

languages.text: Каждый уровень эффекта уменьшает значение всех характеристик персонажа на 5 и повышает шанс критического попадания направленных в него вражеских атак на 5%. Суммируется до 5 раз. Также в начале своего хода с шансом 1% персонаж может оказаться {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженным{/g} на 1 раунд.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect reduces all characteristics by −5 and increases the critical hit chance of incoming attacks by +5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, at the start of this character's turn, they have a 1% chance of becoming {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Каждый уровень эффекта уменьшает значение всех характеристик персонажа на 5 и повышает шанс критического попадания направленных в него вражеских атак на 5%. Суммируется до 5 раз. Также в начале своего хода с шансом 1% персонаж может оказаться {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженным{/g} на 1 раунд.

Каждый уровень эффекта уменьшает значение всех характеристик персонажа на 5 и повышает шанс критического попадания направленных в него вражеских атак на 5%. Суммируется до 5 раз. Также в начале своего хода с шансом 1% персонаж может оказаться {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженным{/g} на 1 раунд.

languages.text: Cada acumulación de este efecto reduce todas las características en −5 y aumenta la probabilidad de impacto crítico de los ataques recibidos un +5 %. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 5 veces. Además, al principio del turno de este personaje, tiene un 1 % de probabilidad de quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} durante 1 asalto.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect reduces all characteristics by −5 and increases the critical hit chance of incoming attacks by +5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, at the start of this character's turn, they have a 1% chance of becoming {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Cada acumulación de este efecto reduce todas las características en −5 y aumenta la probabilidad de impacto crítico de los ataques recibidos un +5 %. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 5 veces. Además, al principio del turno de este personaje, tiene un 1 % de probabilidad de quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: この効果はスタックするごとに全ての特性を-5し、受ける攻撃のクリティカル率を+5%増加させる。最大5回まで蓄積する。さらに、このキャラクターのターン開始時、1%の確率で1ラウンド{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}動けなくなる{/g}。
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect reduces all characteristics by −5 and increases the critical hit chance of incoming attacks by +5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, at the start of this character's turn, they have a 1% chance of becoming {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: この効果はスタックするごとに全ての特性を-5し、受ける攻撃のクリティカル率を+5%増加させる。最大5回まで蓄積する。さらに、このキャラクターのターン開始時、1%の確率で1ラウンド{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}動けなくなる{/g}。

languages.text: 每层效果都会使受影响的角色所有属性降低5点，承受攻击时遭到暴击的概率提高5%，最多叠加5层。此外，受影响的角色回合开始时，会有1%的几率陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果，持续一轮。
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect reduces all characteristics by −5 and increases the critical hit chance of incoming attacks by +5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, at the start of this character's turn, they have a 1% chance of becoming {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 每层效果都会使受影响的角色所有属性降低5点，承受攻击时遭到暴击的概率提高5%，最多叠加5层。此外，受影响的角色回合开始时，会有1%的几率陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果，持续一轮。

languages.text: Jeder Stapel dieses Effektes reduziert alle Eigenschaften um -5 und erhöht die kritische Trefferchance eingehender Angriff um +5 %. Bis zu 5-mal stapelbar. Außerdem hat dieser Charakter zu Beginn seines Zuges eine Chance von 1 %, 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}bewegungsunfähig{/g} zu sein.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect reduces all characteristics by −5 and increases the critical hit chance of incoming attacks by +5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, at the start of this character's turn, they have a 1% chance of becoming {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Stapel dieses Effektes reduziert alle Eigenschaften um -5 und erhöht die kritische Trefferchance eingehender Angriff um +5 %. Bis zu 5-mal stapelbar. Außerdem hat dieser Charakter zu Beginn seines Zuges eine Chance von 1 %, 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}bewegungsunfähig{/g} zu sein.

languages.text: Chaque cumul de cet effet réduit toutes les caractéristiques de -5 et augmente de +5 % les chances que les attaques subies infligent un coup critique. Cumulable jusqu'à 5 fois. De plus, au début de son tour, ce personnage a 1 % de chances de subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect reduces all characteristics by −5 and increases the critical hit chance of incoming attacks by +5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, at the start of this character's turn, they have a 1% chance of becoming {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.

languages.text: Bu etkinin her bir birikimi, tüm nitelikleri 5'er puan azaltır ve gelen saldırıların kritik vuruş olasılığını +%5 artırır. 5 kez üst üste birikebilir. Ayrıca bu karakter, turu başladığında %1 olasılıkla 1 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olma olasılığına sahiptir.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect reduces all characteristics by −5 and increases the critical hit chance of incoming attacks by +5%. Stacks up to 5 times. Additionally, at the start of this character's turn, they have a 1% chance of becoming {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
